constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KTCAAP Name: Kingston Town Centre AAP
KEYACH Name: Key Area of Change
AAS Name: Area of Archaeological Significance

AIRCZ Type: AIRPORTDescription: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Highways and Transport

description: Removal of BT kiosk(s) and replacement with 1no. new InLink structure
decision_conditions: The proposed development by virtue of its size and siting would result in a visually intrusive incongruous addition to the streetscene that would compete with existing street furniture and signage creating street clutter and detract from the character and appearance of the area. The proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.
Representations: 5 surrounding owner/occupiers were notified of the proposals. No responses have been received.

The fee required for your pre- planning application is Â£ 145.00.  Payment can be made via either our Contact Centre on 0208 547 5002 or by cheque made payable to Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames. You may also pay online via the Kingston Council website www.kingston.gov.uk

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Works all to trees at rear of house and not affecting public amenity. Works also acceptable and appropriate management in their own right causing no harm or loss of amenity.Recommendation:No objections.
